name: Microsoft Office DLL Sideload
description: Detects DLL sideloading of DLLs that are part of Microsoft Office from non standard location
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Wietze Beukema (project and research)

detection.query:
selection: {"ImageLoaded|endswith": "\\outllib.dll"}
filter: {"ImageLoaded|startswith": ["C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\OFFICE", "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\OFFICE", "C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft Office\\Root\\OFFICE", "C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Microsoft Office\\Root\\OFFICE"]}
